altername_name: 2 in 1: Paws & Claws: Pet Resort & My Vet Practice: In the Country
2 in 1: My Pet Hotel + My Vet Practice: In the Country
name: 2 in 1: My Pet Hotel + My Vet Practice: In the Country
overview: Not to be confused with the compilation "2 in 1: My Pet Hotel 2 & My Vet Practice: In the Country", this compilation bundles the earlier Pet Hotel game (also known as Paws & Claws: Pet Resort) with My Vet Practice.
